title: PSA: playing brand or malz bot and building full ap is not supporting.
body: Instead, it is "I got autofilled to support but I wanna do the most damage."

OK, genius, tell me where in this build are you going to find room for a Redemption AND a Locket?
{{item:2301}} {{item:3151}} {{item:3116}} {{item:3135}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3020}}

Maybe you can toss out the Deathcap for Locket, since I'm not that keen on Deathcap myself. (Just copying the above build) But where tf is Redemption going to fit? If the enemy has ANY sense, they're going to have Maw + Edge of Night on every AD and Abyssal/Visage, so you can't throw out Void Staff. Liandry's stays too since flat pen is a great stat. (esp. after Void Staff shredded 1/3 of their MR) Rylai's is also very important.

So where's the space for Redemption/Locket?

Locket was changed to where pretty much no one even bothers using it now. With no MR Aura to help the team out, all that it's got going for it is a Shield active, which isn't bad but there's just better things out there.

Redemption really only works well for those that use Shields or Heals and not every traditional support even has those, so why should AP supports build it?

lel.  AP Supports have been around for years and most of them also have CC that helps them support.  So saying they aren't isn't true at all.

Just because they can sometimes get the kills and not the ADC doesn't mean they AREN'T supporting.
